As soon as I started playing, I couldn't stop, I've played the game's original story multiple times, and the singular chapters even more, but it never gets old. I've built multiple levels and even tried hammer (Which I suck at). Just recently I tried co-op with a friend who likes Portal 2 as well, and it was amazing having another good story to play (and experience it with a friend.) This game never gets old. 9/10

ao3

I remember getting The Orange Box on the Xbox 360 when I was like 12 or 13, and playing the first Portal. I was extremely small brain so I only ever did like the first few levels. Seven years later and I finally got around to buying and beating both games. Some of the puzzles still proved hard to my only slightly less small brain, but it was such an amazing experience. The dialogue and interactions are hilarious and the universe is fascinating, especially after learning that it's the same as the Half-Life universe. I'll probably have to buy Black Mesa now since the first Half-Life is the only Half-Life universe game I haven't played.

Overall great experience, there is no excuse to not experience such amazing games since you can get them both for only $20, even less if you wait for a sale. Buy the damn games, do it!

I absolutely love this game, the first one I played on PC and I quickly got used to the controls, the story is fun and easy to follow even if you haven't played the first one, the puzzles are creative and challenging and you feel good when you've completed a puzzle you were stuck on for ages, I love this game and love co-op mode too, 5 stars lol

Это не игра, это ШЕДЕВР! Хотелось бы надеяться на развитие этой вселенной, но как мы все прекрасно знаем, Гейб до 3 считать не умеет, однако это не значит, что вселенная портала умирает. Наоборот, талантливые мододелы клипают отличные моды, которые являются по своей сути отдельными играми, признанные Valve. 
Далеко ходить не надо, Portal Stories: Mell, Portal Reloaded, сама задумка с 3 порталом в Portal Reloaded, меняющим ход времени, звучит крайне интересно.

Если же Вы за 9 лет все еще не ознакомились со вселенной Portal и Half Life, крайне рекомендую к покупке, не пожалеете.
